let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let g = makeRand (seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

                 739085
                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

| VarY ->            "Y"

| Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

  match (f b) with

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in

  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

    (fun () -> mkTest

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));

    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  [

    (fun () -> mkTest

                 (-1)

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]
                 [1;6;2;4;12;13;9]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;1;1]
                 [1]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 wwhile 
                 ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2) 
                 512 
                 "sample: wwhile 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 	fixpoint
                 ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)
                 739085
                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr2, 150,"sample2")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 1 : manual"

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g2 ()))

                 "sample: gray 2 : manual"

    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

    )] 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

  runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
  runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
  runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
  	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
  	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
  | Fail -> "[fail]"
  	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
  name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

  let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
  if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
  _exp 0

  let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

  let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

  let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

  let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

  let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  "sample: fixpoint 1"
  ); 

  (fun () -> mkTest

  ()

  ); 
  (fun () -> mkTest

  (fun () -> mkTest

  (fun () -> mkTest

  let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
  Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
  (Printexc.to_string ex)

  let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in

  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX ->  	     "x"
  | VarY ->            "y"
  | Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
  | Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
  | Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

let _ = eval (sampleExpr,0.5,0.2);;



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in

  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in

  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

type expr =

    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr

let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX ->  	     "x"
  | VarY ->            "y"
  | Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
  | Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
  | Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e = build (g,depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm")) 

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let g = makeRand (seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX ->  	     "x"
  | VarY ->            "y"
  | Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
  | Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
  | Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"

let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

  let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

  let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
  let _ = f low in 
  ffor (low+1,high,f)

  let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
  ffor (-n, n, 
  fun ix ->
  ffor (-n, n, 
  fun iy ->
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let x = toReal(ix,n) in
  let y = toReal(iy,n) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let z = f (x,y) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let iz = toIntensity(z) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
  close_out chan;
  ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
  ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
  let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);

  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
  )) in

  type test = unit -> string

  let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
  let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
  let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

  exception ErrorCode of string

  exception TestException

  type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

  let score = ref 0
  let max = ref 0
  let timeout = 300

  let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

  let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
  runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
  runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
  runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
  runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
  	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
  	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
  | Fail -> "[fail]"
  	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
  name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
  if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
  _exp 0

  let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

  let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

  let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

  let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

  let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

  let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

  let sampleTests =
  [
  (fun () -> mkTest
  assoc
  (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
  23
  "sample: assoc 1"
  );
  (fun () -> mkTest 
  assoc
  (-1, "bob", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
  (-1)
  "sample: assoc 2"
  ); 
  (fun () -> mkTest

  [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]
  [1;6;2;4;12;13;9]
  "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
  );
  (fun () -> mkTest 
  removeDuplicates
  [1;1;1]
  [1]
  "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
  );

  (fun () -> mkTest 
  wwhile 
  ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2) 
  512 
  "sample: wwhile 1"
  ); 
  (fun () -> mkTest 
  	fixpoint
  ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)
  739085
  "sample: fixpoint 1"
  ); 

  (fun () -> mkTest 
  emitGrayscale
  (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
  ()
  "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
  ); 
  (fun () -> mkTest 
  emitGrayscale
  (eval_fn sampleExpr2, 150,"sample2")
  ()
  "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"
  );

  (fun () -> mkTest

  ()
  ()
  "sample: gray 1 : manual"
  );
  (fun () -> mkTest 
  (fun () -> doRandomGray (g2 ()))
  ()
  ()
  "sample: gray 2 : manual"
  );
  (fun () -> mkTest

  ()
  ()
  "sample: gray 3 : manual"
  );

  (fun () -> mkTest

  ()

  "sample: color 1 : manual"

  (fun () -> mkTest

  "sample: color 2 : manual"
  );
  (fun () -> mkTest 
  (fun () -> doRandomColor (c3 ()))
  ()
  ()
  "sample: color 3 : manual"
  )] 

  let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
  Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
  (Printexc.to_string ex)

  let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
  (!score, !max)

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let _ = assoc (-1,"william",[("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)]);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr

let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX ->  	     "x"
  | VarY ->            "y"
  | Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
  | Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
  | Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e = build (g,depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm")) 

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

  | Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))

  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  let f = eval_fn e in

  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let g = makeRand (seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  try f () with ex ->

let _ =

type expr =

  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

  type test = unit -> string

  let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
  let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
  let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

  exception ErrorCode of string

  exception TestException

  type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

  let score = ref 0
  let max = ref 0
  let timeout = 300

  let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

  let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
  runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
  runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
  runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
  runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
  	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
  	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
  | Fail -> "[fail]"
  	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
  name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
  if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
  _exp 0

  let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

  let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

  let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

  let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

  let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

  let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

  let sampleTests =
  [
  (fun () -> mkTest
  assoc
  (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
  23
  "sample: assoc 1"
  );
  (fun () -> mkTest

  "sample: assoc 2"
  );

  );
  (fun () -> mkTest

  [1]
  "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
  );

  (fun () -> mkTest

  ); 
  (fun () -> mkTest

  "sample: fixpoint 1"
  ); 

  (fun () -> mkTest

  ()
  "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
  ); 
  (fun () -> mkTest

  "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"

  let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
  Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
  (Printexc.to_string ex)

  let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
  (!score, !max)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
| Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
| Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
| Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
| VarX ->	     x
| VarY ->	     y

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (w, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile(f,b) =
  match (f b) with 
    | (v,false) -> v
    | (v,true)  -> wwhile(f,v);;

let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX ->  	     "x"
  | VarY ->            "y"
  | Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
  | Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
  | Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"

  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

  let makeRand (seed1, seed2) =

  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


  let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

  let rec ffor (low,high,f) =

  let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr

let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX ->  	     "x"
  | VarY ->            "y"
  | Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
  | Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
  | Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"

let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            	  helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile(f,b) =

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX ->  	     "x"
  | VarY ->            "y"
  | Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
  | Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
  | Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"



let sampleExpr1 = Thresh(VarX,VarY,VarX,(Times(Sine(VarX),Cosine(Average(VarX,VarY)))));;

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

                                                                                                                         (buildY())),buildAverage (buildSine (buildX()), buildTimes
                                                                                                                                                                           (buildX(),buildX()))))))),buildY())))


let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm")) 

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let g = makeRand (seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    	match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        	    Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      	  | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX ->  	     "x"
  | VarY ->            "y"
  | Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
  | Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
  | Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
  | Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"

let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)
