let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (w, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | Square (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Cube (a,b,c) ->
      ((eval (a, x, y)) *. (eval (b, x, y))) *. (eval (c, x, y))
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Square of expr* expr
  | Cube of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildCube (a,b,c) = Cube (a, b, c);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSquare (e1,e2) = Square (e1, e2);;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth > 0
  then
    let depth = depth - 1 in
    match rand (0, 6) with
    | 0 -> buildSine (build (rand, depth))
    | 1 -> buildCosine (build (rand, depth))
    | 2 -> buildAverage ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 3 -> buildTimes ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 4 ->
        buildThresh
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 5 -> buildSquare ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | _ ->
        buildCube
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)))
  else (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> buildX () | _ -> buildY ());;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine v -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Cosine v -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Average (v,w) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (v,w) -> (exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString w))
  | Thresh (v,w,x,y) ->
      (exprToString v) ^
        ("<" ^
           ((exprToString w) ^
              ("?" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")"))))))
  | Square (v,w) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")))
  | Cube (v,w,x) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString v) ^
           ("*" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString x)))));;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 assoc
                 (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 23
                 "sample: assoc 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 assoc
                 (-1, "bob", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 (-1)
                 "sample: assoc 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]
                 [1;6;2;4;12;13;9]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;1;1]
                 [1]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 wwhile 
                 ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2) 
                 512 
                 "sample: wwhile 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 fixpoint
                 ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)
                 739085
                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr2, 150,"sample2")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g2 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g3 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 3 : manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c2 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c3 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 3 : manual"
    )] 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec exprToString e = match e with 
| VarX ->  	     "x"
| VarY ->            "y"
| Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
| Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
| Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"
| Square(v,w) ->     "("^exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Cube(v,w,x) ->     "("^exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)^"*"^exprToString(x)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
| Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
| Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
| Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
| Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
| Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
| VarX ->	     x
| VarY ->	     y

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
if depth > 0 
then let depth = (depth -1) in
match rand(0,6) with
| 0 -> buildSine(build(rand,depth))
| 1 -> buildCosine(build(rand,depth))
| 2 -> buildAverage(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| 3 -> buildTimes(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 4 -> buildThresh(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 5 -> buildSquare(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| _ -> buildCube(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
else 
match rand(0,2) with
| 0 -> buildX()
| _ -> buildY()

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
let s = Random.State.make seed in
(fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

let rec rseq g r n =
if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
if low > high then () else 
let _ = f low in 
ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
let _ = 
ffor (-n, n, 
fun ix ->
ffor (-n, n, 
fun iy ->
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let x = toReal(ix,n) in
let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let z = f (x,y) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let iz = toIntensity(z) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
close_out chan;
ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let e = build (g,depth) in
let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
let f = eval_fn e in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n = 150 in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n2p1 = n*2+1 in

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let z1 = f1 (x,y) in

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

ocaml.min:
let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (w, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | Square (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Cube (a,b,c) ->
      ((eval (a, x, y)) *. (eval (b, x, y))) *. (eval (c, x, y))
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Square of expr* expr
  | Cube of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildCube (a,b,c) = Cube (a, b, c);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSquare (e1,e2) = Square (e1, e2);;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth > 0
  then
    let depth = depth - 1 in
    match rand (0, 6) with
    | 0 -> buildSine (build (rand, depth))
    | 1 -> buildCosine (build (rand, depth))
    | 2 -> buildAverage ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 3 -> buildTimes ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 4 ->
        buildThresh
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 5 -> buildSquare ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | _ ->
        buildCube
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)))
  else (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> buildX () | _ -> buildY ());;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine v -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Cosine v -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Average (v,w) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (v,w) -> (exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString w))
  | Thresh (v,w,x,y) ->
      (exprToString v) ^
        ("<" ^
           ((exprToString w) ^
              ("?" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")"))))))
  | Square (v,w) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")))
  | Cube (v,w,x) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString v) ^
           ("*" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString x)))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in
  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

  | Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
  | Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 assoc
                 (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 23

    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 assoc
                 (-1, "bob", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 (-1)
                 "sample: assoc 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]
                 [1;6;2;4;12;13;9]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;1;1]
                 [1]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 wwhile 
                 ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2) 
                 512 
                 "sample: wwhile 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 fixpoint
                 ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)
                 739085
                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr2, 150,"sample2")

    (fun () -> mkTest

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
| Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
| Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
| Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
| Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
| Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
| VarX ->	     x
| VarY ->	     y

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
if depth > 0 
then let depth = (depth -1) in
match rand(0,6) with
| 0 -> buildSine(build(rand,depth))
| 1 -> buildCosine(build(rand,depth))
| 2 -> buildAverage(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| 3 -> buildTimes(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 4 -> buildThresh(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 5 -> buildSquare(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| _ -> buildCube(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
else 
match rand(0,2) with
| 0 -> buildX()
| _ -> buildY()

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
let s = Random.State.make seed in
(fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

let rec rseq g r n =
if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
if low > high then () else 
let _ = f low in 
ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
let _ = 
ffor (-n, n, 
fun ix ->
ffor (-n, n, 
fun iy ->
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let x = toReal(ix,n) in
let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let z = f (x,y) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let iz = toIntensity(z) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
close_out chan;
ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let e = build (g,depth) in
let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
let f = eval_fn e in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n = 150 in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
let _ = 
ffor (-n, n, 
fun ix ->
ffor (-n, n, 
fun iy ->
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let x = toReal(ix,n) in
let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (w, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | Square (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Cube (a,b,c) ->
      ((eval (a, x, y)) *. (eval (b, x, y))) *. (eval (c, x, y))
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Square of expr* expr
  | Cube of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildCube (a,b,c) = Cube (a, b, c);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSquare (e1,e2) = Square (e1, e2);;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth > 0
  then
    let depth = depth - 1 in
    match rand (0, 6) with
    | 0 -> buildSine (build (rand, depth))
    | 1 -> buildCosine (build (rand, depth))
    | 2 -> buildAverage ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 3 -> buildTimes ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 4 ->
        buildThresh
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 5 -> buildSquare ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | _ ->
        buildCube
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)))
  else (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> buildX () | _ -> buildY ());;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine v -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Cosine v -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Average (v,w) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (v,w) -> (exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString w))
  | Thresh (v,w,x,y) ->
      (exprToString v) ^
        ("<" ^
           ((exprToString w) ^
              ("?" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")"))))))
  | Square (v,w) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")))
  | Cube (v,w,x) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString v) ^
           ("*" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString x)))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 assoc
                 (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 23

    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 assoc
                 (-1, "bob", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 (-1)
                 "sample: assoc 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]
                 [1;6;2;4;12;13;9]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;1;1]
                 [1]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 wwhile 
                 ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2)

                 "sample: wwhile 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 fixpoint
                 ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)

                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")

                 ()

    (fun () -> mkTest

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec exprToString e = match e with 
| VarX ->  	     "x"
| VarY ->            "y"
| Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
| Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
| Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"
| Square(v,w) ->     "("^exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Cube(v,w,x) ->     "("^exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)^"*"^exprToString(x)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
| Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
| Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
| Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
| Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
| Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
| VarX ->	     x
| VarY ->	     y

  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

ocaml.in:
let rec build (rand, depth) = 
if depth > 0 
then let depth = (depth -1) in
match rand(0,6) with
| 0 -> buildSine(build(rand,depth))
| 1 -> buildCosine(build(rand,depth))
| 2 -> buildAverage(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| 3 -> buildTimes(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 4 -> buildThresh(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 5 -> buildSquare(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| _ -> buildCube(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
else 
match rand(0,2) with
| 0 -> buildX()
| _ -> buildY()

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
let s = Random.State.make seed in
(fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

let rec rseq g r n =
if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;
let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
if low > high then () else 
let _ = f low in 
ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
let _ = 
ffor (-n, n, 
fun ix ->
ffor (-n, n, 
fun iy ->
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let x = toReal(ix,n) in
let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let z = f (x,y) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let iz = toIntensity(z) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
close_out chan;
ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let e = build (g,depth) in
let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
let f = eval_fn e in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n = 150 in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
let _ = 
ffor (-n, n, 
fun ix ->
ffor (-n, n, 
fun iy ->
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let x = toReal(ix,n) in
let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (w, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | Square (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Cube (a,b,c) ->
      ((eval (a, x, y)) *. (eval (b, x, y))) *. (eval (c, x, y))
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Square of expr* expr
  | Cube of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildCube (a,b,c) = Cube (a, b, c);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSquare (e1,e2) = Square (e1, e2);;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth > 0
  then
    let depth = depth - 1 in
    match rand (0, 6) with
    | 0 -> buildSine (build (rand, depth))
    | 1 -> buildCosine (build (rand, depth))
    | 2 -> buildAverage ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 3 -> buildTimes ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 4 ->
        buildThresh
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 5 -> buildSquare ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | _ ->
        buildCube
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)))
  else (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> buildX () | _ -> buildY ());;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine v -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Cosine v -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Average (v,w) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (v,w) -> (exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString w))
  | Thresh (v,w,x,y) ->
      (exprToString v) ^
        ("<" ^
           ((exprToString w) ^
              ("?" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")"))))))
  | Square (v,w) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")))
  | Cube (v,w,x) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString v) ^
           ("*" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString x)))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
| Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
| Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
| Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
| Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
| Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
| VarX ->	     x
| VarY ->	     y

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
if depth > 0 
then let depth = (depth -1) in
match rand(0,6) with
| 0 -> buildSine(build(rand,depth))
| 1 -> buildCosine(build(rand,depth))
| 2 -> buildAverage(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| 3 -> buildTimes(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 4 -> buildThresh(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 5 -> buildSquare(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| _ -> buildCube(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
else 
match rand(0,2) with
| 0 -> buildX()
| _ -> buildY()

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
let s = Random.State.make seed in
(fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (w, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | Square (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Cube (a,b,c) ->
      ((eval (a, x, y)) *. (eval (b, x, y))) *. (eval (c, x, y))
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Square of expr* expr
  | Cube of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildCube (a,b,c) = Cube (a, b, c);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSquare (e1,e2) = Square (e1, e2);;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth > 0
  then
    let depth = depth - 1 in
    match rand (0, 6) with
    | 0 -> buildSine (build (rand, depth))
    | 1 -> buildCosine (build (rand, depth))
    | 2 -> buildAverage ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 3 -> buildTimes ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 4 ->
        buildThresh
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 5 -> buildSquare ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | _ ->
        buildCube
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)))
  else (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> buildX () | _ -> buildY ());;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine v -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Cosine v -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Average (v,w) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (v,w) -> (exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString w))
  | Thresh (v,w,x,y) ->
      (exprToString v) ^
        ("<" ^
           ((exprToString w) ^
              ("?" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")"))))))
  | Square (v,w) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")))
  | Cube (v,w,x) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString v) ^
           ("*" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString x)))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =

  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in
  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

  match l with

      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))

  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
| Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
| Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
| Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
| Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
| Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
| VarX ->	     x
| VarY ->	     y

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
if depth > 0 
then let depth = (depth -1) in
match rand(0,6) with
| 0 -> buildSine(build(rand,depth))
| 1 -> buildCosine(build(rand,depth))
| 2 -> buildAverage(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| 3 -> buildTimes(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 4 -> buildThresh(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 5 -> buildSquare(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| _ -> buildCube(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
else 
match rand(0,2) with
| 0 -> buildX()
| _ -> buildY()

let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
let s = Random.State.make seed in
(fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (w, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | Square (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Cube (a,b,c) ->
      ((eval (a, x, y)) *. (eval (b, x, y))) *. (eval (c, x, y))
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Square of expr* expr
  | Cube of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildCube (a,b,c) = Cube (a, b, c);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSquare (e1,e2) = Square (e1, e2);;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth > 0
  then
    let depth = depth - 1 in
    match rand (0, 6) with
    | 0 -> buildSine (build (rand, depth))
    | 1 -> buildCosine (build (rand, depth))
    | 2 -> buildAverage ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 3 -> buildTimes ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 4 ->
        buildThresh
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 5 -> buildSquare ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | _ ->
        buildCube
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)))
  else (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> buildX () | _ -> buildY ());;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine v -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Cosine v -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Average (v,w) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (v,w) -> (exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString w))
  | Thresh (v,w,x,y) ->
      (exprToString v) ^
        ("<" ^
           ((exprToString w) ^
              ("?" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")"))))))
  | Square (v,w) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")))
  | Cube (v,w,x) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString v) ^
           ("*" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString x)))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in
  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
  | Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 assoc
                 (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 23
                 "sample: assoc 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 assoc
                 (-1, "bob", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 (-1)
                 "sample: assoc 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]
                 [1;6;2;4;12;13;9]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;1;1]
                 [1]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 wwhile 
                 ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2) 
                 512 
                 "sample: wwhile 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 fixpoint
                 ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)
                 739085
                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr2, 150,"sample2")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest

                 "sample: gray 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

                 "sample: color 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c3 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 3 : manual"
    )] 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec exprToString e = match e with 
| VarX ->  	     "x"
| VarY ->            "y"
| Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
| Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
| Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"
| Square(v,w) ->     "("^exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Cube(v,w,x) ->     "("^exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)^"*"^exprToString(x)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
| Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
| Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
| Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
| Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
| Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
| VarX ->	     x
| VarY ->	     y

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
if depth > 0 
then let depth = (depth -1) in
match rand(0,6) with
| 0 -> buildSine(build(rand,depth))
| 1 -> buildCosine(build(rand,depth))
| 2 -> buildAverage(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| 3 -> buildTimes(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 4 -> buildThresh(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 5 -> buildSquare(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| _ -> buildCube(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
else 
match rand(0,2) with
| 0 -> buildX()
| _ -> buildY()

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
let s = Random.State.make seed in
(fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

let rec rseq g r n =
if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
if low > high then () else 
let _ = f low in 
ffor (low+1,high,f)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let iz = toIntensity(z) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

close_out chan;
ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let f = eval_fn e in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (w, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | Square (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Cube (a,b,c) ->
      ((eval (a, x, y)) *. (eval (b, x, y))) *. (eval (c, x, y))
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Square of expr* expr
  | Cube of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildCube (a,b,c) = Cube (a, b, c);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSquare (e1,e2) = Square (e1, e2);;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth > 0
  then
    let depth = depth - 1 in
    match rand (0, 6) with
    | 0 -> buildSine (build (rand, depth))
    | 1 -> buildCosine (build (rand, depth))
    | 2 -> buildAverage ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 3 -> buildTimes ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 4 ->
        buildThresh
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 5 -> buildSquare ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | _ ->
        buildCube
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)))
  else (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> buildX () | _ -> buildY ());;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine v -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Cosine v -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Average (v,w) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (v,w) -> (exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString w))
  | Thresh (v,w,x,y) ->
      (exprToString v) ^
        ("<" ^
           ((exprToString w) ^
              ("?" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")"))))))
  | Square (v,w) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")))
  | Cube (v,w,x) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString v) ^
           ("*" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString x)))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in
  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
  | Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y

                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));

let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec exprToString e = match e with 
| VarX ->  	     "x"
| VarY ->            "y"
| Sine(v) ->         "sin(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Cosine(v) ->       "cos(pi*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Average(v,w) ->    "(("^exprToString(v)^"+"^exprToString(w)^")/2)"
| Times(v,w) ->      exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)
| Thresh(v,w,x,y) -> exprToString(v)^"<"^exprToString(w)^"?"^exprToString(x)^":"^exprToString(y)^")"
| Square(v,w) ->     "("^exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(v)^")"
| Cube(v,w,x) ->     "("^exprToString(v)^"*"^exprToString(w)^"*"^exprToString(x)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
| Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
| Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
| Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
| Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
| Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
| Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
| VarX ->	     x
| VarY ->	     y

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
if depth > 0 
then let depth = (depth -1) in
match rand(0,6) with
| 0 -> buildSine(build(rand,depth))
| 1 -> buildCosine(build(rand,depth))
| 2 -> buildAverage(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| 3 -> buildTimes(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 4 -> buildThresh(build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth), build(rand,depth))
| 5 -> buildSquare(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
| _ -> buildCube(build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth),build(rand,depth))
else 
match rand(0,2) with
| 0 -> buildX()
| _ -> buildY()

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
let s = Random.State.make seed in
(fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

let rec rseq g r n =
if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
if low > high then () else 
let _ = f low in 
ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
let _ = 
ffor (-n, n, 
fun ix ->
ffor (-n, n, 
fun iy ->
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let x = toReal(ix,n) in
let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let z = f (x,y) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let iz = toIntensity(z) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
close_out chan;
ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let e = build (g,depth) in
let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
let f = eval_fn e in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let n = 150 in
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | Sine v -> sin (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Cosine v -> cos (pi *. (eval (v, x, y)))
  | Average (v,w) -> ((eval (v, x, y)) +. (eval (w, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (w, x, y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      if (eval (a, x, y)) < (eval (b, x, y))
      then eval (c, x, y)
      else eval (d, x, y)
  | Square (v,w) -> (eval (v, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Cube (a,b,c) ->
      ((eval (a, x, y)) *. (eval (b, x, y))) *. (eval (c, x, y))
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Square of expr* expr
  | Cube of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildCube (a,b,c) = Cube (a, b, c);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildSquare (e1,e2) = Square (e1, e2);;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth > 0
  then
    let depth = depth - 1 in
    match rand (0, 6) with
    | 0 -> buildSine (build (rand, depth))
    | 1 -> buildCosine (build (rand, depth))
    | 2 -> buildAverage ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 3 -> buildTimes ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 4 ->
        buildThresh
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | 5 -> buildSquare ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)))
    | _ ->
        buildCube
          ((build (rand, depth)), (build (rand, depth)),
            (build (rand, depth)))
  else (match rand (0, 2) with | 0 -> buildX () | _ -> buildY ());;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine v -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Cosine v -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")
  | Average (v,w) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (v,w) -> (exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString w))
  | Thresh (v,w,x,y) ->
      (exprToString v) ^
        ("<" ^
           ((exprToString w) ^
              ("?" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")"))))))
  | Square (v,w) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString v) ^ ")")))
  | Cube (v,w,x) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString v) ^
           ("*" ^ ((exprToString w) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString x)))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in
  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) =   
  match l with
    | [] -> d
    | x :: xs -> match x with
      | (s,i) -> if s = k then i else assoc(d,k,xs)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = false then h::seen
            else seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | Sine(v) ->         sin(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Cosine(v) ->       cos(pi*.eval(v,x,y))
  | Average(v,w) ->    (((eval(v,x,y) +. eval(w,x,y)))/.2.0)
  | Times(v,w) ->      eval(v,x,y) *. eval(w,x,y)
  | Thresh(a,b,c,d) -> if ((eval(a,x,y)) < (eval(b,x,y))) then (eval(c,x,y)) else (eval(d,x,y))
  | Square(v,w) ->     (eval(v,x,y) *. eval(v,x,y))
  | Cube(a,b,c) ->     (eval(a,x,y) *. eval(b,x,y) *. eval(c,x,y))
  | VarX ->	     x
  | VarY ->	     y
